testcase.name: Free CRM Add a new Employee Test Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login Page.........................................passed When title of Login Page is Free CRM........................................passed And user enters "Admin" and "admin123"......................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user is on Home Page...................................................passed Then user moves the mouse over pim and click on add employee................passed Then user is on add employee page...........................................passed Then user tipps "bayon" and "Mbayo".........................................passed Then user click on save button..............................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
